Instruction: Describe the target grid.
Generate the referring expression starting with the tag "Expression: " for the given target grid. Omit any other text.

Expression: A 5 by 5 grid with an empty cell in the top left and an X in the other four cells of the first row, then an empty cell in the second column of the second row and an X in the other four cells of the second row, and so on for the remaining rows.
